price: 23 Nous avons envoyé Moïse, assisté de Nos signes et de preuves éclatantes,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
